text: Massimo Mattioli (25 September 1943 – 23 August 2019) was an Italian artist and cartoonist. He was born in Rome. Mattioli began his career in 1965. He was also published in Corto Maltese and Frigidaire. In 1973 he began his works with Il Giornalino, creating the character Pinky. In 1977, he created the underground magazine Cannibale. In 1978, Cannibale published the first adventure of Joe Galaxy. In 1982, he created the Squeak the Mouse series.
